backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor including resident, medication, vitals, MAR, and ADL data types and related DTOs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to modified files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend source files for reference.
frontend/docs/deploy-v57.md: Deployment guide for Version 57 detailing verification steps, deployment commands, and smoke‑test checklist.
frontend/docs/deploy-v58.md: Deployment guide for Version 58 with updated version markers, deployment steps, and post-deploy tests.
frontend/docs/rollback-to-v46.md: Rollback guide restoring Version 57 behavior with steps, validation checks, and troubleshooting notes.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and themes for light and dark modes with palette and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and linking icons and manifest.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icon, and display theme.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router and QueryClient, wraps routes in authentication gate and app shell.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Handles Internet Identity auth flow, showing loading, login prompt, or protected content.
Displays the brand logo with fallback logic for missing images and multiple URL variants.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: App shell with header, navigation, footer, and sign-out handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Navigation bar rendering dashboard link with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Dialog for creating a new resident with form fields, validation, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: Dialog form for creating new ADL records with validation and submission logic.
Lists, sorts, and deletes ADL records, displaying loading and empty states.
Re-exports ADL dialog and history list components.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog for editing resident information with dynamic lists for physicians and contacts.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Dialog form for creating MAR records tied to active medications.
Re-exports MAR dialog and history list components.
Displays, sorts, and deletes MAR records with fallback UI states.
Modal form for adding a medication, handling input fields, route/physician selection, time entries, and submission formatting.
Modal for editing an existing medication, populating fields from the record and saving updates with formatted values.
Barrel file exporting medication-related components and utilities.
Physician selector component with fallback text input when no physicians exist, supporting unassigned values.
Selector for medication administration route with support for predefined options and a custom 'other' text field.
Row action controls for medications including edit, discontinue/resume, and delete with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Card displaying resident summary with view, status toggle, and delete actions.
Header component displaying page title and an action button to add a resident.
Provides room filtering and sorting controls for the resident list.
Renders a grid of ResidentCard components or an empty state when no residents match.
Shows KPI cards for total, active, and discharged residents.
Status filter tabs for switching between all, active, and discharged residents.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Dialog for entering and submitting daily vital signs with validation, timestamp creation, and form reset.
Displays a resident's vitals history with sorting, status badges, and delete actions using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Renders a placeholder card listing missing reference items and links to a full checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/residentQueryKeys.ts: Provides scoped React Query keys for resident directory and detail lookups.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useHealthCheck.ts: Runs a timeout‑protected health check against the backend and returns a derived reachability status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and persistent identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for user profiles, residents directory, and other resident‑related operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom light/dark themes plus print‑specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports app branding constants including name and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/medicationRoutes.ts: Defines medication route options and utilities to convert between backend route objects, UI select values, and display labels.
frontend/src/lib/medications.ts: Provides helpers to update, delete, filter, toggle status, and generate IDs for medication objects in arrays.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the resident dashboard with filtering, sorting, KPIs, health checks, and resident management actions.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data for residents with a sample generator function.
Defines mock resident profile structures and a fallback profile generator.
Contains a mock resident directory with basic demographic and care info.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Provides utilities to calculate a resident’s age from a birthdate and format it for display.
Defines ResidentViewModel and utilities to map backend resident data into UI-friendly objects with age and room formatting.
Provides filtering, sorting, KPI calculations, and room extraction helpers for ResidentViewModel lists.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Displays and manages a resident’s full profile, including vitals, medications, ADLs, and editable personal information.
Renders a printable resident profile report including demographics and medication details.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: Renders a reference‑capture page listing required screenshots and design details for replicating the Moritz UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session‑persisted parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, features, issues, and generated assets for the Maui Lane Care Home build.
